// About.js import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import RedGif from './RedGif'; import './About.css'; const About = () => { return (
Home Tour Movies Contact

Welcome to BoxxOffice

This is a React web application with a landing page, Movie section, Registration, Login, and About page. I created my own API with data related to movies and used core concepts of React like React hooks, useState, and a bit of React-Bootstrap. I created Registration and Login Page with "Formik" and used "Yup" (a library by JQuense) for Validation.

Made by: Abhay Kumar

Explore
); }; export default About;
